summary: usb: musb: dsps: Fix the probe error path
details:
usb: musb: dsps: Fix the probe error path

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.75 by commit 9d89e287116796bf987cc48f5c8632ef3048f8eb, it was introduced in version v5.10.67 by commit 8de01a896c1bc14b6b65b8d26013626597a45eda. For more details please see the references link.
